item.description:
LET'S CHEER UP A GLOOMY DAY BY GOING TO THE MOVIES TO SEE "LINCOLN" at Chunky's Cinema Pub.

Â 

MOVIE DETAILS:

As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

12 Oscar Nominations. 2 hours and 30 minutes.

THEATER DETAILS:

For those of you that are not familiar with Chunky's, it is a movie theater that is set up with long tables and chairs from old cars instead of the typical stadium arrangement.

They serve dinner, but you are not obligated to purchase anything. The menue includes adult beverages, soups, salads, sandwiches, entrees, and desserts.

ADMISSION DETAILS:

Chuncky's gives everyone a $2 discount on Mondays so the $5.50 admission price is cheaper than the admission to matinees.

GENERAL COMMENTS:

If you arrive late, just come into the theater and look for the meetup sign.

This event is cross posted to multiple meetup sites so please limit your "YES" RSVP's to one site to avoid duplications. No need to rsvp "NO."

Patricipation is at your own risk.

Barb/Peanut (603) 540-7467
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the inner lobby at 6:00 pm. I will wear a meetup pin.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: MID WEEK MOVIE
